reviews.review_msg: He is as crystal clear as they come - his exams are extremely fair.  Do the questions.. they will be on the exams.  The lab is wicked.. super laid back and you learn a lot.  The most fair proff i've ever had!

Really good prof. Dedicated and always willing to answer your questions.  The course isn't easy = just keep on top of the material and u should be fine.  IT takes effort, but its worth it - labs are fun.
